title: Riot's Thank You Gift
body:
I received the gift today and I owned Riot Kayle before the event so my question is

How do I find out the skin I received from the Mystery Gift compensation? or if I even received it since I didnt get a 2nd popup

replies.body:
You'll get a pop up notification that tells you what mystery gift you received since you already own Riot Kayle. We're still sending these out until the 30th.

Let me know if you don't have anything after the 30th passes.
